Fresno.Fresno Pacific University Biblical Semin: Fresno Pacific University Biblical Seminary, formerly the Mennonite Brethren Biblical Seminary, is the denominational seminary of the United States and Canadian Mennonite Brethren Churches. It was founded in 1955 in Fresno, California. In addition to the main campus at Fresno Pacific University, it has campuses at Trinity Western University in Langley, British Columbia, and Canadian Mennonite University in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
